Text: Future ProspectsKen Now that the election is over finally I am turning to exploring future prospects after my current post as Deputy Secretary and COO of the Department of Energy I am following up your offer the last time we met to call you when I was next thinking about making a job change The last time when I moved to DOE from OMB in the White House we were trying to meet but had just been unable to match our schedules I am from California and am most interested in going back to help some business in the energy sector carry out an effective strategic approach to that market during this difficult period I believe the combination of my political and business experience can be very helpful in these times I am attaching a copy of my resume and look forward to talking to you Sincerely TJ resumestdwpd
